status_info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

components.data:
The cell counting settings should be the following:

  • Dilution factor: 200
  • Count Sizes between 3.5um – 13.5um
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
The cell counting settings should be the following:

  • Dilution factor: 200
  • Count Sizes between 3.5um – 13.5um

components.data: Fill a clean cuvette with 10ml hemasol and use it to flush the aperture if the count greater than 35,000
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Fill a clean cuvette with 10ml hemasol and use it to flush the aperture if the count greater than 35,000

components.data: With a cuvette containing 10ml hemasol in the machine, count a blank sample
components.name: Description

source_data.description: With a cuvette containing 10ml hemasol in the machine, count a blank sample

components.data: pipet 50ul of culture into cuvette with 10ml hemasol and start the counter with the desired size range
components.name: Description

source_data.description: pipet 50ul of culture into cuvette with 10ml hemasol and start the counter with the desired size range

components.data: Immediately rinse all cuvettes with water in the sink and place them out to dry on the drying racks on the diapers
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Immediately rinse all cuvettes with water in the sink and place them out to dry on the drying racks on the diapers
